Package it.unipd.dei.se.faderic.utils

Class ConfigProperties

java.lang.Object
it.unipd.dei.se.faderic.utils.ConfigProperties
public class ConfigProperties extends Object
The ConfigProperties class is used to load and retrieve properties from a configuration file for a search engine application.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static enum 
    ConfigProperties.Language
    Defining an enumeration type Language for the language options.
    static enum 
    ConfigProperties.SimilarityName
    The SimilarityName enum is defining a set of possible values for the type of similarity to be used in this system.
    static enum 
    ConfigProperties.StemmerName
    The StemmerName enum is defining a set of possible values for the type of stemmer to be used in this system.

  • Field Details

    • lang

      public static ConfigProperties.Language lang
      The language chosen in the config file for the system

  • Constructor Details

    • ConfigProperties

      public ConfigProperties()

  • Method Details

    • getDocsPath

      public static String getDocsPath()
      This function retrieves the document path from a properties file and throws an exception if it is blank.
      Returns:
      The method is returning a String value which is the value of the indexer.<lang>.docsPath property from a properties file.

    • getIndexPath

      public static String getIndexPath()
      This function retrieves the index path from a properties file and throws an exception if it is blank.
      Returns:
      The method is returning a String value which is the value of the "indexer.<lang>.indexPath" property from a properties file.

    • getSimilarity

      public static org.apache.lucene.search.similarities.Similarity getSimilarity()
      This function returns a similarity object based on the value of a property, either BM25 or LMDirichlet, with optional parameters.
      Returns:
      The method is returning an instance of the Similarity interface, which is either a BM25Similarity or a LMDirichletSimilarity object, depending on the value of the "general.similarity" property in the prop object.

    • getAnalyzer

      public static org.apache.lucene.analysis.Analyzer getAnalyzer(boolean useStopFilter)
      This function returns an Analyzer based on the language specified, with an option to use a stop filter.
      Parameters:
      useStopFilter - A boolean value that determines whether or not to use a stop filter in the analyzer.
      Returns:
      An instance of either EnglishLongEvalAnalyzer or FrenchLongEvalAnalyzer depending on the value of the boolean parameter useStopFilter.

    • getAnalyzer

      public static org.apache.lucene.analysis.Analyzer getAnalyzer()
      The function returns an Analyzer object with a default setting of true for the useStopFilter parameter.
      Returns:
      An instance of either EnglishLongEvalAnalyzer or FrenchLongEvalAnalyzer

    • getStopSet

      public static org.apache.lucene.analysis.CharArraySet getStopSet()
      This function returns a set of stop words based on the language specified in the properties file or defaults to English or French.
      Returns:
      The method is returning a CharArraySet object, which is either the default stop set for English or French language, or a custom stop set loaded from a file specified in a properties file.

    • getStemmerName

      public static ConfigProperties.StemmerName getStemmerName()
      This function retrieves the stemmer name from a properties file and returns it as an enum value, throwing an exception if the stemmer name is not available for the specified language.
      Returns:
      The method is returning a value of type StemmerName.

    • getTopicsFile

      public static String getTopicsFile()
      This function retrieves the topics file path from a properties file based on the language and throws an exception if the property is not found.
      Returns:
      The method is returning a String value which is the value of the searcher.<lang>.topicsFile property from a properties file.

    • getRunID

      public static String getRunID()
      This function retrieves a run ID from a properties file and throws an exception if it is blank.
      Returns:
      The method is returning a String value which is the runID obtained from the properties file.

    • getMaxShingleSize

      public static int getMaxShingleSize()
      This function retrieves the maximum shingle size from a properties file and validates that it is an integer greater than or equal to 2.
      Returns:
      The method returns an integer value which represents the maximum shingle size. If the value of the property searcher.maxShingleSize is not specified or is blank, it returns -1. If the value is specified but is not a valid integer or is less than 2, it throws an IllegalStateException. Otherwise, it returns the integer value of the property.

    • getFuzzyThreshold

      public static int getFuzzyThreshold()
      This function retrieves and validates a fuzzy threshold value from a properties file.
      Returns:
      The method returns an integer value representing the fuzzy threshold. If the value of the property searcher.fuzzyThreshold is blank, it returns -1. If the value is not an integer or is less than 1, it throws an IllegalStateException with an appropriate message. Otherwise, it returns the parsed integer value of the property.

    • getSynonymAnalyzer

      public static org.apache.lucene.analysis.Analyzer getSynonymAnalyzer()
      This function returns a synonym analyzer based on the language and configuration properties.
      Returns:
      The method is returning an instance of the Analyzer class, either a SynonymPOSAnalyzer or a SynonymAnalyzer depending on certain conditions.

    • getSpellCheckDict

      public static org.apache.lucene.search.spell.PlainTextDictionary getSpellCheckDict()
      This function retrieves a spell check dictionary based on a specified language.
      Returns:
      The method is returning a PlainTextDictionary object.

    • getNumDocsToRerank

      public static int getNumDocsToRerank()
      This function retrieves the number of documents to be re-ranked from a configuration file and validates that it is an integer greater than or equal to 2.
      Returns:
      The method returns an integer value representing the number of documents to be reranked. If the value is not specified or is less than 2, it returns -1.

    • getRerankScoreWeight

      public static float getRerankScoreWeight()
      This function retrieves and validates a float value for the rerank score weight from a properties file.
      Returns:
      The method returns a float value representing the weight of the rerank score. If the value is not specified or is invalid, it returns -1f.

    • useReranking

      public static boolean useReranking()
      The function checks if reranking should be used based on the values of the number of documents to rerank and the rerank score weight.
      Returns:
      A boolean value indicating whether reranking should be used or not. It checks if the number of documents to rerank and the rerank score weight are both not equal to -1. If both conditions are true, it returns true, otherwise it returns false.

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Main method of the class. Just for testing purposes.
      Parameters:
      args - command line arguments
